short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save tabs and group them so you an access them at a later time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Tab allows you to save the current tab or tabs of the current window so you can open them at a later time. You can rearrange tabs into groups to effectively organize them.
